name: Precambrian
description: 4,567.3 - 538.8 mya$(br)$(l)The Precambrian Super-eon is home to a myriad of weird and elusive forms that evolved before the Phanerozoic Eon, and by the Ediacaran life began to establish itself, but come the Paleozoic Era, life as we know it evolved, pushing most Precambrian forms into extinction, with very few surviving beyond.
